DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : The maximum body weight in lifetime is associated with the onset of development of type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Maximum Body Weight in Lifetime on the Development of Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Obesity is well recognized risk factor for type 2 diabetes. Recent studies reported that weight change, especially severe weight gain was associated with an increased risk of type 2 diabetes. The aim of this study is to investigate whether the maximum body weight of lifetime is associated with the early onset of type 2 diabetes or an increased risk of type 2 diabetes in Korean.
DOC.criteria: Korean with type 2 diabetes Korean with confirmed IFG or IGT Korean with NGT Malignancy except thyroid cancer Active tuberculosis
